channel.title: Weeklypedia
channel.description: The most edited Wikipedia articles and discussions from the last week

item.title: Weeklypedia - February 13, 2026
item.description:
Articles

This week, 76,934 authors made 745,614 changes to 371,040 different articles. The top 20 articles for the week:

  1. 2026 Tumbler Ridge school shooting (1,108 changes by 260 authors)
  2. 2026 Men's T20 World Cup (669 changes by 48 authors)
  3. Deaths in 2026 (499 changes by 91 authors)
  4. Prominent individuals mentioned in the Epstein files (465 changes by 60 authors)
  5. 2026 Bangladeshi general election (462 changes by 60 authors)
  6. Super Bowl LX (408 changes by 137 authors)
  7. Super Bowl LX halftime show (394 changes by 106 authors)
  8. 2026 Japanese general election (390 changes by 116 authors)
  9. Wimmera Football League (373 changes by 4 authors)
  10. Nile (362 changes by 6 authors)
  11. 2025 Bondi Beach shooting (308 changes by 29 authors)
  12. 2026 Qatar TotalEnergies Open – Singles (295 changes by 29 authors)
  13. United States at the 2026 Winter Olympics (292 changes by 30 authors)
  14. Disappearance of Nancy Guthrie (282 changes by 88 authors)
  15. Deaths in June 1982 (282 changes by 1 authors)
  16. 2026 Winter Olympics opening ceremony (262 changes by 102 authors)
  17. Bicentennial Capitol Mall State Park (261 changes by 4 authors)
  18. Madan Paliwal (258 changes by 7 authors)
  19. James Van Der Beek (242 changes by 74 authors)
  20. Figure skating at the 2026 Winter Olympics – Team event (231 changes by 25 authors)

New Articles

The ten most actively edited articles created within the last week

  1. 2026 Tumbler Ridge school shooting (1,109 changes by 260 authors)
  2. 2026 Islamabad suicide bombing (189 changes by 77 authors)
  3. Progresses of Mary, Queen of Scots (139 changes by 1 authors)
  4. 2026 Liberal Party of Australia leadership spill motion (133 changes by 36 authors)
  5. 2026 ABN AMRO Open – Singles (114 changes by 17 authors)
  6. 2009 Italian Beach Soccer League (101 changes by 5 authors)
  7. 2026 Argentina Open – Singles (95 changes by 12 authors)
  8. 2026 Dallas Open – Singles (92 changes by 13 authors)
  9. List of United States post offices in Virginia (77 changes by 1 authors)
  10. Benjamin Farar Sr. (75 changes by 6 authors)

Discussions

The most active discussions:

  1. Imane Khelif
  2. 2026 Tumbler Ridge school shooting
  3. Twitter
  4. Prominent individuals mentioned in the Epstein files
  5. Killing of Alex Pretti
